```{r,fig.height = 7, fig.width = 10}
metadata = read.csv("testdata/G798_Metadata.csv")
compound_info = read.csv("testdata/G798_Compound_info.csv")

tidy_data = read.csv("testdata/G798_tidy_data.csv")
metadata = read.csv("testdata/G798_Metadata.csv")

phgrobiome_output = phgrobiome(tidy_data,metadata)

compound_info = read.csv("testdata/G798_updated_compound_info.csv")

annotated_data = meta_combine(phgrobiome_output, metadata = metadata,compound_info = compound_info)

ECO.38 = filter(annotated_data,Community == "ECO.38")

colored_dendro(annotated_data = annotated_data,cols_with_color_label = c("Community","Composition","Manual_Curation","Compound"),legend_name = "Manual_Curation")



```
